# 1. normal video id
## request session

<pre>
GET https://api.acgplusplus.com/api/app/video/ver2/user/clickPlayVideo_2_2/2/1920?videoId=84328&playType=0&time=1549006736738 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
accessToken: 13ed493f33e8fb239908d375cddd395d959a41deace2c53861f29722e7d8c67b
X-Client-NonceStr: CGknyKxxMO
X-Client-IP: 127.0.0.1
X-Client-TimeStamp: 1549006736738
X-Client-Version: 2.5.0
X-Client-Sign: 0816c1176bdff5f3f26b5a890f682e1e4f768d1d:0
X-Client-Token: 
X-Auth-Token: mb_token:37818609:367f78fe087f8a3772ffe66dc8801327
Host: api.acgplusplus.com
Connection: Keep-Alive
Accept-Encoding: gzip
User-Agent: okhttp/3.11.0

</pre>

## response session
<pre>
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: NWSs
Date: Fri, 01 Feb 2019 07:38:56 GMT
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Connection: keep-alive
X-NWS-UUID-VERIFY: 1a1d7e80e1abbd31f567b30b3d9ef387
X-Server-TimeStamp: 1549006736
accessToken: 13ed493f33e8fb239908d375cddd395d959a41deace2c53861f29722e7d8c67b
X-Daa-Tunnel: hop_count=2
X-NWS-LOG-UUID: 7bfcfc90-58cf-40fe-853e-c93063317105
Content-Length: 2752


</pre>

# 2. normal video id
## request session

```
GET https://api.acgplusplus.com/api/app/video/ver2/user/clickPlayVideo_2_2/2/1920?videoId=84328&playType=0&time=1549003938609 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
accessToken: 7f364c2eb16bcfaa4d6d5fe5fdfe3303bd1a30ab5444583f5e65992704bcbd29
X-Client-NonceStr: lyLEwLIVOs
X-Client-IP: 127.0.0.1
X-Client-TimeStamp: 1549003938608
X-Client-Version: 2.5.0
X-Client-Sign: 84562dbfe0d311a037a9b4b4c58afbf5931a1939:0
X-Client-Token: 
X-Auth-Token: mb_token:37818609:367f78fe087f8a3772ffe66dc8801327
Host: api.acgplusplus.com
Connection: Keep-Alive
Accept-Encoding: gzip
User-Agent: okhttp/3.11.0

```

## response session
```
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: NWSs
Date: Fri, 01 Feb 2019 07:37:17 GMT
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Connection: keep-alive
X-NWS-UUID-VERIFY: 0a2100206d81d86c482524eb1f9db352
X-Server-TimeStamp: 1549006637
accessToken: 7f364c2eb16bcfaa4d6d5fe5fdfe3303bd1a30ab5444583f5e65992704bcbd29
X-Daa-Tunnel: hop_count=2
X-NWS-LOG-UUID: f50b49b2-e238-4790-8b40-76fbe03f5553
Content-Length: 2752



```

# 3. change header content,normal video id
## request session
```
GET https://api.acgplusplus.com/api/app/video/ver2/user/clickPlayVideo_2_2/2/1920?videoId=84328 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
accessToken: 0
X-Client-NonceStr: lyLEwLIVOs
X-Client-IP: 127.0.0.1
X-Client-TimeStamp: 1549003938608
X-Client-Version: 2.5.0
X-Client-Sign: 84562dbfe0d311a037a9b4b4c58afbf5931a1939:0
X-Client-Token: 
X-Auth-Token: mb_token:037818608:0
Host: api.acgplusplus.com
Connection: Keep-Alive
Accept-Encoding: gzip
User-Agent: okhttp/3.11.0

```

